title-group.article-title: EXPERIENCES OF COLLECTIVE TRAUMA AND POLITICAL ACTIVISM: A STUDY OF WOMEN 'AGENTS OF MEMORY' IN POST-SOVIET LITHUANIA

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright © 2010 The Association for the Advancement of Baltic Studies
